subject: Pro pedals uograde
description_text:
Just confirming that this is the right upgrade kit for these pedals .

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Immanuel Podesta,     ​You have currently selected the ProX Ultra upgrade kit. To ensure compatibility, please choose the PlusX upgrade kit from the link below.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit?variant=51087403843898
